alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 3:04PM EST until December 23 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds possibly gusting as high as 55 mph late Thursday night. * WHERE...Hamilton, Northern Warren and Northern Fulton Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Thursday to 5 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage late Thursday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop late Thursday afternoon and continue through Thursday evening. The snow is expected to gradually change to plain rain after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
